name: Braveshard
description:
BRAVESHARD About

Fun top-down shooter with building mechanics, campaign, survival mode, upgrades and unlocks of new nature elements.


Story

The Great Star is destroyed...
The world was plunged into the darkness of despair and endless wars for the possession of the magical Starshards that fell to the ground after the Scarlet Starfall.
But one of these shards turned out to be... alive!
Vague memories lead him to the rest of the Starshards.  Will he meet friends along the way? Will he be able to restore the Great Star and peace?

Author

Code, art, story, sound, music are made by Alexey Sudarenkov
